argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zzsnmOLD.1 | |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 3 |  | #P_ringmnd | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. Mnd ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- CCfld e. Mnd |
| 5 |  | #P_0z | |- 0 e. ZZ |
| 6 |  | #P_zsscn | |- ZZ C_ CC |
| 7 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 9 |  | #P_cnfldnm | |- abs = ( norm ` CCfld ) |
| 10 | 1, 7, 8, 9 | #P_ressnm | |- ( ( CCfld e. Mnd /\ 0 e. ZZ /\ ZZ C_ CC ) -> ( abs |` ZZ ) = ( norm ` Z ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 5, 6, 10 | #P_mp3an | |- ( abs |` ZZ ) = ( norm ` Z ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq1i | |- ( ( abs |` ZZ ) ` M ) = ( ( norm ` Z ) ` M ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( abs |` ZZ ) ` M ) = ( abs ` M ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl5reqr | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( abs ` M ) = ( ( norm ` Z ) ` M ) ) |
